headline: BTS Kicks Off a 'New Era' in South Korea with World Tour - Agoda Reports 8x Increase in Searches to Goyang
summary: Digital travel platform Agoda has witnessed a rise in travel interest to South Korea's Goyang and Busan as well as other key tour cities following the announcement of BTS's world tour dates earlier this week. This marks the group's first tour after a four-year hiatus, and fans are ready to "spring day" into action to catch their favorite group live. Following the announcement of their tour dates on Tuesday, Agoda observed a nearly 8x increase in accommodation searches to Goyang, where BTS's tour
